channel.title: Item weilding problem!
channel.description: A lot of people wanted me to add Dragon kite and other items. The problem is, all the items, (even if they're armour) are weilded as a weapin. If anyone can help me out, I'd really appreciate it. So for example, the dragon kite's code is 8001 and is weilded as a weapon. What do I have to change or add to weild it as a sheild? Thanks!

item.title: Item weilding problem!
item.dc:creator: @Adelmas Adelmas
item.description:
@Adelmas wrote:

Open up item.java, or item.cfg what ever it is.

Search the item.

Pickup THAT item id. If it still doesn’t work, then you are using the wrong client.

Read full topic

item.title: Item weilding problem!
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

ok i figured that out now i made an item put it in my client then compiled and the went in my client types ::pickup 14871 1
and it shows up as a null y?

Read full topic

item.title: Item weilding problem!

item.description:
@kyle2kylek wrote:

go into Item4.java search shields and add 8001 into it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2009, 04:41:31 pm[/size][hr]Tell me ur server ip ill explain more about it on there
